message.body: ...i replied to your email.
also i had the strangest dream last night, and you were in it. probably should've put that in the email.
Oh yea? Lol. Well if you sent another email it still wouldn't break your record for consecutive emails.
and my consecutive emails, i think.
I wanted to write so you have a proper writing sample to make fun of
what am i supposed to be making fun of, your handwriting or something?
You did when I wrote on snapchat.
ah. well, your regular handwriting looks acceptable.
okay that one i couldn't read at all
did you read my email?
Yes.
are you going to reply?
Yea but I'm working and I like a day to roll the thoughts around. You gonna email me the dream?
when i get off work. it was weird as fuck, so be prepared.
Haha I don't put much stock in dreams. I'm mostly looking forward to your writing style. But lord knows I've sent you enough dreams
what do you do at work and when do you get off?
haven't i explained my job before? and i just clocked out.
you just said you were a tA for something
for the ceramics studio.
i can guarantee you i at least told you that much.
yeah so like every other TA in the world you grade papers and quizzes right?
no. i'll send you another job description in the email.
